AzureAdB2C.Instance: [Enter the instance url of your B2C tenant, e.g. https://fabrikamb2c.b2clogin.com]
AzureAdB2C.Domain: [Enter the domain of your B2C tenant, e.g. fabrikamb2c.onmicrosoft.com]
AzureAdB2C.TenantId: [Enter 'common', or 'organizations' or the Tenant Id (Obtained from the Azure portal. Select 'Endpoints' from the 'App registrations' blade and use the GUID in any of the URLs), e.g. da41245a5-11b3-996c-00a8-4d99re19f292]
AzureAdB2C.ClientId: [Enter the Client Id of the service (Application ID obtained from the Azure portal), e.g. ba74781c2-53c2-442a-97c2-3d60re42f403]

DownstreamApi.Scopes: [Put the space seperated scopes you want to place here for your app. e.g. 'https://fabrikamb2c.onmicrosoft.com/helloapi/demo.read https://fabrikamb2c.onmicrosoft.com/helloapi/demo.write']
